name: Arctovish
description: The Fossil Pokémon. Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: While it is snowing or hailing, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency modifier at the end of each of its turns.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage, and its speed is doubled in arctic conditions, or during a hailstorm.
